name: The Die is Cast (GMTK)
description:
A game about manipulating your fate in order to find the truth about your death. Featuring gambling and death!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Controls:1-6: Pick Numbers
Z: Next dialogue, black die
X, Space: Skip dialogue, open note
C: White die
Creators:Clickan Seventh: Game design, programming, idea
alleichech: Art, testing, idea
KpoKoT: Game design, testing, idea

Featured music:"Semi-Funk" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
